Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Laramie due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Laramie due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
